dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: You’d better behave and keep your noggin safe and sound, ‘cause we might need somethin’ around for kick the can.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: I remember now… Their intimidating language is what made them infamous in the first place…

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Rumor has it, their language is so coarse that it once inflicted enough psychological damage to reduce dozens of rival Syndicate members into gibbering messes...
Oi, you lot! You'd better shut your bloody mouths while I'm bein' nice—

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Who the fuck do you think you're eyeballin' up 'n down, little man? Keep starin' and I'll pluck 'em right outta them sockets for ya, dog-eyes.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Easy, don't be so hard on 'em! I cracked one open like an eggshell in the scuffle, hollered into 'em, and heard only my voice echoin' back 'cuz its empty as a drum.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Well brush me sideways, they don’t even got a string o’ egg noodle for brains? What’s the round thing on their shoulders, then? A bag o’ gas?
Hm. Wonder if they all go to the same asshole school.
I— I mean, it was kinda funny. D-don't glare at me like that~
